Title: Priorities, People!
Description:
When I ordered the excavation of the tunnel to the northwest, I thought we'd find something useful. Gold, iron... anything!

Instead, we found mogu artifacts, and I get a bunch of dwarves from the Explorers' League to baby-sit.

I hear from the soldiers that there's trouble in the mines. I have orders from Wrynn that I have to support the Explorers' League, but I can't spare any troops. Can you get down there and find out what's going on?
ObjectivesText: Meet with Hilda Hornswaggle at the Ruins of Ogudei in Krasarang Wilds.
RewardText: Oi! We got a right nasty problem here. Kicked the hornet's nest. Except these are mogu ghost hornets with a mean streak a bloody mile wide!
